name: MechaForce
description:
A small 3D RTS game I built in Unity as an assignment for the Game Development course I'm taking. This is a short demo and with more time the gameplay could be expanded by adding additional units and terrain elements.

Note: This game requires WebGL 2.0 support in your browser (e.g. Firefox, Chrome, Opera) and will not worker in all browsers (e.g. Internet Explorer, Safari).
